title: Beautiful Three-Bedroom w/ Plenty of Natural Light & Laundry In-Unit!!
posting_body: Welcome to Assembly
Built on the foundations of Oakland's historic auto row, there's more than tradition at work here; there's artistry and care built into every detail.
Studio to three-bedroom homes are beautifully crafted to fit your lifestyle with quartz counter tops, stainless-steel appliances, floor-to-ceiling windows, and wide plank flooring throughout.
Rich with thoughtfully-designed gathering spaces, including an expansive roof terrace, a two-level exercise haven and a peaceful courtyard, community is at the heart of Assembly.
Amenities Include:
Courtyard with custom mural & fire pit
Glass door showers or shower & soaking tub duo
Yoga deck leading out to courtyard
GE stainless steel appliance suite with gas stove top
Keyless entry
Nest thermostats with A/C
Two-level fitness center with HIIT equipment & top of the line cardio machines
In-home washer & dryer
Quartz countertops & ceramic tile backsplash
Floor to ceiling windows & wide plank flooring throughout
Indoor-outdoor club room
Roof deck with gas grills & spacious cabanas
Apt#425
